issue.title: [C++] Add "ostream_stderr" and "ostream_stdout" span exporters
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15930](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15930). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For convenience, since "ostream" doesn't let you control where to output OpenTelemetry data. This is mostly useful for debugging.
